Please note!
 You can reserve only one slot in events calendar at a time.
product.reserveMessageText: Your previous slot reservation will expire if you try to reserve another slot.

checkout.coinsDisabledMessage: MonsteR Coins are temporarily unavailable for selected payment method. We are working to bring it to you as soon as it would be possible.
checkout.registerInfoMessage:
Important message for our current customers, registered on mmonster.eu website
Please create a new account on our new mmonster.co website using the same email address you've used for old mmonster.eu website registration in order to get access to your previous account and MmonsteR coins balance.

wishlist.metaDescription: Add your favorite boost services to your wishlist and transform your gameplay with top-rated professionals. Quick, safe, and customized boosts for all your favorite games await!
